articles.title: Subsidies and grants for some 20,000 people miscalculated due to processing issue: MOH
articles.summary:

articles.content: Find out whatâ€™s new on ST website and app. The ministry added that it has completed a reassessment of the affected individualsâ€™ subsidy tiers. The majority of those affected received more subsidies and grants than they were entitled to, said the ministry. They will not have to return the excess subsidy or grant amounts that have already been paid out. Those who received less than they were entitled to will have the difference topped up by government agencies, said MOH. They will receive the reimbursement payments by November 2025.
